Our mission is to offer you unlimited access to a constantly updated library, from timeless classics to the latest releases, all in optimal streaming quality.

En accédant et en utilisant notre servic: By accessing and using our service, you unreservedly agree to be bound by these General Terms of Use (GTU). If you do not agree to these GTU, please do not use our platform.
L'intégralité du contenu disponible sur: The entirety of the content available on the platform (movies, series, graphics, logos) is the property of our licensors and is protected by copyright laws. Any unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or commercial use is strictly prohibited.
Tous les titres, descriptions et métadon: All titles, descriptions, and metadata are provided by the TMDB API. Copyrighted video content is not hosted or streamed by our service.
Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility. We commit to protecting your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
Nous collectons les informations nécessa: We collect information necessary for the provision of our services, including: your email address (upon registration), payment information (processed by a secure third party), and your viewing preferences to personalize your recommendations.
Vos données sont utilisées dans le but u: Your data is used for the sole purpose of improving your experience on our platform: managing your account, providing content, personalizing recommendations, and improving site features.
Nous mettons en œuvre des mesures de séc: We implement strict security measures (SSL encryption, secure access protocols) to protect your data against unauthorized access. Your personal data is never sold or rented to third parties. It is only shared with third-party service providers (e.g., payment processors) strictly necessary for the execution of the service.

Quels appareils puis-je utiliser pour re: Which devices can I use to watch?
Notre plateforme est accessible sur tous: Our platform is accessible on all modern web browsers, as well as on iOS, Android, Smart TVs (Samsung, LG), and gaming consoles (PS5, Xbox).
Comment annuler mon abonnement ?: How do I cancel my subscription?
Vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement à t: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the 'Account and Settings' section. The cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.
Le contenu est-il disponible en qualité: Is the content available in HD or 4K quality?
La majorité de notre catalogue est dispo: The majority of our catalog is available in HD. The latest titles and our original productions are available in 4K UHD streaming, depending on your device and Internet connection speed.
Le contenu complet est-il disponible en: Is the full content available for streaming?
Notre plateforme utilise les métadonnées: Our platform uses metadata from the TMDB (The Movie Database) API for demonstration and informational purposes only. Consequently, we do not offer streaming of full, copyrighted movies or TV series. The 'Watch now' and 'Watch trailer' buttons both display the title's official trailer.
